Reviews.Title: “Very good value for money, good service”
Reviews.Author: mjfrans
Reviews.Content: reading reviews website afraid enjoy time richmond hotel pleasantly surprised agree comments posted earlier hotel located nice indian restaurants weeks time metro station al karama 10 minutes walk hotel access tourist sites easier hotel nice bathroom cooking hotel swimming pool nice view dubai skyline hotel service booked night check 12 afternoon spent entire day dubai hotel pick stuff seeing dubai warm sweaty shower catching plane staff helpfull accomodating didnt extra extra bit service wonderfull tight budget dubai dont hesitate book hotel extremely value money staff friendly
